Description:
Prepares reports of data results, presenting and explaining findings to senior leadership.
Develops actionable short- and long-term goals and benchmarks based on data analysis and presents them to senior leadership for approval.
Creates data-driven reports on recruitment, retention, and compliance, presenting insights and recommendations to the management team.
Examines HR metrics and data to identify trends and patterns related to employee recruitment, retention, and compliance with labor laws and regulations.Skills
Skills:
Problem Solving & Result Orientation.
Skilled in using HR software and Microsoft Office.
Proficient with HR software and experienced in using Microsoft Office applications.
Skilled in problem-solving and committed to achieving results through effective solutions.
